meanings.definition: Mesosaurs: an extinct group of small, aquatic reptiles
meanings.sent1: The museum had a fascinating exhibit about mesosaurs.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the fossils of mesosaurs to learn more about ancient reptiles.
meanings.sent3: The mesosaurs threw a pool party, but no one showed up because they were extinct.
meanings.sent4: In the depths of the ocean, the mesosaurs swam gracefully like ancient dancers.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the lifelike model of a mesosaur at the science museum.

meanings.definition: Mesosaurs: relating to or characteristic of the mesosaurs
meanings.sent1: The researcher presented new findings on mesosaurs anatomy.
meanings.sent2: The mesosaurs fossils provided valuable information about prehistoric life.
meanings.sent3: The party decorations had a mesosaurs theme, with tiny reptile figurines everywhere.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes had a mesosaurs-like gaze, ancient and mysterious.
meanings.sent5: The ancient cave paintings depicted mesosaurs in vivid detail, capturing their essence.
